attributes.action: Leave the EU on the 29th March
attributes.additional_details: The EU want us to become the United States of Europe, this could result in us losing our currency and going to the Euro, the UK losing its Identity as a country and dictated by the European Commisson.
attributes.background: The Will of the people was to the Leave the EU on the 29th March 2019. Parliament should respect the 17 million votes and should leave the EU with a No Deal rather then a bad deal.
